org.hps.digi

Class HodoscopeDigitizationWithPulserDataMergingReadoutDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.digi.DigitizationWithPulserDataMergingReadoutDriver<Hodoscope_v1>
          • org.hps.digi.HodoscopeDigitizationWithPulserDataMergingReadoutDriver

  • public class HodoscopeDigitizationWithPulserDataMergingReadoutDriver
extends DigitizationWithPulserDataMergingReadoutDriver<Hodoscope_v1>
    Class HodoscopeDigitizationWithPulserDataMergingReadoutDriver is an implementation of the DigitizationWithPulserDataMergingReadoutDriver for a subdetector of type Hodoscope_v1. It handles all of the hodoscope-specific functions needed by the superclass.
    Author:
    Tongtong Cao

      • factorGainConversion

        private double factorGainConversion
        Factor for gain conversion from self-define-unit/ADC to MeV/ADC.

      • hodoConditions

        private HodoscopeConditions hodoConditions
        Gain scaling factor for raw energy (self-defined unit) of FADC hits. In DAQ configuration, gains are scaled by the gain scaling factor for two-hole tiles. Such gains from DAQ configuration should be divided by the factor.

      • setDaqConfigurationAppliedintoReadout

        public void setDaqConfigurationAppliedintoReadout(boolean state)
        Sets whether or not the DAQ configuration is applied into the driver the EvIO data stream or whether to read the configuration from data files.
        Parameters:
        state - - true indicates that the DAQ configuration is applied into the readout system, and false that it is not applied into the readout system.
